synopsis.text: Jing Sung's relentless bullying forces Park Hyung-Seok, a chubby and unattractive teenager, to transfer to Seoul's Jae Won High School, known for its liberal education system and carefree students. On his first day, a viral video of him getting beaten up further tarnishes his image. However, Hyung-Seok wakes up in a new body - tall, handsome, and perfect. With this newfound attractiveness, he aims to achieve everything he couldn't before. But maintaining his secret proves challenging as he navigates his new life while solving the mystery of his second body. In a world obsessed with looks, Hyung-Seok must balance his two contrasting lives, each presenting unique challenges and opportunities. Will he succeed in keeping his secret, or will his past catch up to him?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
